channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-20506] Add doc and test for unused RetryCounter, useful-looking utility
item.description: I thought I could use RetryCounter, old facility added years ago, for doing backoff calculations. In the end, it didn't work for me because it is lacking pb serialization. While trying to use it, I added a bit of doc and a test. Might help the next dev that trips along this way.
item.summary: Add doc and test for unused RetryCounter, useful-looking utility

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
